titleStmt.title: Faces about, or, A recrimination charged upon Mr. John Goodvvin in the point of fighting against God, and opposing the way of Christ and a justification of the Presbyterian way in the particulars by him unjustly charged upon it : vvith other short animadversions upon his late book called [Theomachia] or, The grand imprudence of men running the hazard of fighting against God, &c.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

titleStmt.title: Faces about, or, A recrimination charged upon Mr. John Goodvvin in the point of fighting against God, and opposing the way of Christ and a justification of the Presbyterian way in the particulars by him unjustly charged upon it : vvith other short animadversions upon his late book called [Theomachia] or, The grand imprudence of men running the hazard of fighting against God, &c.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Prynne. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
